<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/my-pay/register-payment"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>




## 부가설명 및 특이사항
결제수단 webUI를 띄우기 위한 파라미터를 조회합니다.

payMethod에 입력한 값에 따라 다른 webUI를 응답합니다.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"clientReturnUrl","in":"query","description":"결제수단 등록 완료 후 client 이동 url","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"https://www.nhn-commerce.com"},{"name":"payMethod","in":"query","description":"결제수단 코드 (신용카드: 01, 계좌: 16)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"01"},{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본 값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"},{"name":"accessToken","in":"header","description":"회원 엑세스 토큰","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-access-token"},{"name":"Shop-By-Authorization","in":"header","description":"액세스 토큰(Oauth2 스펙)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"Bearer test-access-token"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"wpayUserKey":{"type":"string","description":"암호화된 이니시스에서 발행한 SEED wpayUserKey","example":"82fGOwir8hlYR2aboH/vkw=="},"signature":{"type":"string","description":"검증 hash 값","example":"b687a5dd63a49d713e08e98fe1008493860bcfeaa80da362e01e25410279f1cf"},"webUrl":{"type":"string","description":"webUI url","example":"https://webUI.com"},"mid":{"type":"string","description":"가맹점 ID","example":"INIwpayT03"},"returnUrl":{"type":"string","description":"결과전달 URL","example":"https://callback.com"}},"description":"","title":"my-pay-register-payment720401483"},"examples":{"get-register-payment":{"value":"{\"mid\":\"INIwpayT03\",\"wpayUserKey\":\"82fGOwir8hlYR2aboH/vkw==\",\"returnUrl\":\"https://callbackUrl.com\",\"signature\":\"\",\"webUrl\":\"https://webUI.com\"}"}}}}}}}
